head.title: Schedule for Equity and Convertible Debt

hedline.hl1: Schedule for Equity and Convertible Debt

block.p: The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
AdStar.com, Marina del Rey, Calif., an initial public offering of a million units, each representing three common shares and two redeemable warrants. Paulson Investment.
The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
AdStar.com, Marina del Rey, Calif., an initial public offering of a million units, each representing three common shares and two redeemable warrants. Paulson Investment.
Atmel, San Jose, Calif., four million shares. Morgan Stanley Dean Witter.
AXT, Fremont, Calif., 2.2 million shares. Prudential Securities.
Bookham Technology, Oxfordshire, England, 18.5 million American depository receipts. Goldman, Sachs.
Cal Divo International, Houston, 3.7 million shares. Credit Suisse First Boston.
Chiles Offshore, Houston, an initial public offering of 6.5 million shares. Credit Suisse First Boston and Salomon Smith Barney.
Concord Camera, Hollywood, Fla., 3.5 million shares. Raymond James.
Curon Medical, Sunnyvale, Calif.,, an initial public offering of five million shares. UBS Warburg.
Elantec Semiconductor, Milpitas, Calif., 1.6 million shares. Robertson Stephens.
Inrango Technologies, Mount Laurel, N.J., an initial public offering of 7.7 million class B shares. Salomon Smith Barney.
OmniSky, Palo Alto, Calif., an initial public offering of 9.1 million shares. Credit Suisse First Boston.
Prize Energy, Grapevine, Tex, 3.8 million shares. Lehman Brothers.
TTM Technologies, Redmond, Wash., an initial public offering of 7.5 million shares. Robertson Stephens.
Turnstone Systems, Santa Clara, Calif,, four million shares. Goldman, Sachs.
Zongino, Fremont, Calif., an initial public offering of 4.3 million shares. William Blair.
